i1.name: Iron Ambassador
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} Periodically, '''Poppy''' {{tip|projectile|throws}} her buckler as her next [[basic attack]], gaining {{sti|350 '''bonus''' range}} and dealing {{pp|20 to 180|color=magic damage}} {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}}. The buckler then falls near the target after hitting, where it remains for up to 4 seconds.

When '''Poppy''' picks up the buckler, she {{tip|shield|shields}} herself for {{sti|health|{{as|{{pp|key=%|15 to 20 for 3|1 to 13}} of her '''maximum''' health}}}} for 3 seconds. If the buckler kills its target, it bounces back to '''Poppy''' automatically. Enemy {{tip|champion|champions}} can step on the buckler to destroy it.
i1.descriptionHtml:
Innate: Periodically, Poppy throws her buckler as her next basic attack, gaining 350 bonus range and dealing 20undefined − 180undefined (based on level) bonus magic damage. The buckler then falls near the target after hitting, where it remains for up to 4 seconds.
When Poppy picks up the buckler, she shields herself for 1 to 13 ‒ undefined of her maximum health for 3 seconds. If the buckler kills its target, it bounces back to Poppy automatically. Enemy champions can step on the buckler to destroy it.

e1.name: Heroic Charge
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Poppy''' {{tip|dashes}} to the target enemy's location and, if they are in range upon arrival, she deals them {{as|physical damage}} and {{tip|airborne|carries}} them along with her for up to 400 units.
If the target collides with terrain, she deals them the same {{as|physical damage}} again and {{tip|stun|stuns}} them for a duration.
e1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Poppy dashes to the target enemy's location and, if they are in range upon arrival, she deals them physical damage and carries them along with her for up to 400 units.
If the target collides with terrain, she deals them the same physical damage again and stuns them for a duration.
leveling: {{st|Initial Physical Damage|{{ap|60 to 140}} {{as|(+ 50% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Total Physical Damage|{{ap|60*2 to 140*2}} {{as|(+ 100% '''bonus''' AD)}}}}
e1.notes:
* '''Poppy''' will be ordered to basic attack the target.
* ''Heroic Charge'' can apply [[Ability effects|spell effects]] twice (once when '''Poppy''' hits her target and once she stuns them against a wall). ** Both instances of damage and crowd control are all the same {{tip|cast instance}}. Effects that only trigger once per spell cast will not trigger twice.
* '''Poppy''' dashes slightly less far than the distance she pushes the target.
* ''Heroic Charge'' can interact with [[Terrain#Player-Generated|player-generated terrain]].
* The {{tip|dash}} does not follow targets. The target's position at the time of ''Heroic Charge's'' cast is the direction '''Poppy''' will dash towards.
** '''Poppy''' does not {{tip|airborne|carry}} nor deal damage to the target if they have left a certain radius before she collides with them.

effects.str:
• Initial Physical Damage: (+ 50% bonus AD)
  • Total Physical Damage: (+ 100% bonus AD)

w1.name: Steadfast Presence
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Poppy's''' {{sti|armor|{{as|'''total''' armor}}}} and {{sti|mr|{{as|'''total''' magic resistance}}}} are both increased by 10%, doubled to 20% when she falls {{sti|health|{{as|below 40% '''maximum''' health}}}}.

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Poppy''' gains {{sti|ms|{{as|40% '''bonus''' movement speed}}}} for 2 seconds and generates an [[aura]] around herself for the duration, causing all enemies who attempt to {{tip|dash}} into or within it to be dealt {{as|magic damage}}, {{tip|airborne|knocked up}} for {{fd|0.5}} seconds and, if they were successfully interrupted, {{tip|ground|grounded}} and {{tip|slow|slowed}} by 25% for 2 seconds.
''Steadfast Presence'' can only block a single dash per enemy per cast.
w1.descriptionHtml:
Passive: Poppy's total armor and total magic resistance are both increased by 10%, doubled to 20% when she falls below 40% maximum health.
Active: Poppy gains 40% bonus movement speed for 2 seconds and generates an aura around herself for the duration, causing all enemies who attempt to dash into or within it to be dealt magic damage, knocked up for 0.5 seconds and, if they were successfully interrupted, grounded and slowed by 25% for 2 seconds.
Steadfast Presence can only block a single dash per enemy per cast.
w1.notes:
* ''Steadfast Presence'' does not stop {{tip|dash|dashes}} if the unit is {{tip|cc-immune|crowd control immune}}, {{tip|displacement immune}}, {{tip|untargetable}}, or protected by {{tip|spell shield}} in the process (e.g. {{ai|Death Mark|Zed}}, {{ai|Stormbringer|Volibear}}, {{ai|Unstoppable Force|Malphite}}).
** Dashes when the unit is {{tip|cc-immune|crowd control immune}} or {{tip|unstoppable}} still trigger the aura and take the damage, but do not get {{tip|airborne|knocked up}} and thus also never become {{tip|ground|grounded}} and {{tip|slow|slowed}}.
** {{tip|spell shield|Spell shields}} deny all the effects if ''Steadfast Presence'' is triggered by their holder, and are consumed in the process.
** Being {{tip|untargetable}} prevents ''Steadfast Presence'' from triggering, but this does not prevent it from triggering against another, targetable dash.
* ''Steadfast Presence'' does not trigger against {{tip|lunge|lunges}}.

q1.name: Hammer Shock
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Poppy''' smashes the ground in front of her in the target direction, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to all enemies struck within. Against {{tip|monsters}}, the damage based on their {{as|'''maximum''' health}} is capped.
The impacted ground then becomes unstable, {{tip|slow|slowing}} enemies within before erupting after 1 second, dealing the same {{as|physical damage}} to all enemies inside.
q1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Poppy smashes the ground in front of her in the target direction, dealing physical damage to all enemies struck within. Against monsters, the damage based on their maximum health is capped.
The impacted ground then becomes unstable, slowing enemies within before erupting after 1 second, dealing the same physical damage to all enemies inside.
leveling:
{{st|Initial Physical Damage|{{ap|40 to 120}} {{as|(+ 90% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ 8% of target's '''maximum''' health)}}|Total Physical Damage|{{ap|40*2 to 120*2}} {{as|(+ 180% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ 16% of target's '''maximum''' health)}}}}
{{st|Maximum Initial Monster Damage|{{ap|40+50 to 120+170}} {{as|(+ 90% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Maximum Monster Damage|{{ap|(40+50)*2 to (120+170)*2}} {{as|(+ 180% '''bonus''' AD)}}}}
q1.notes:
* {{tip|Spell shield|Spell shields}} will block only a single instance of damage.
* ''Hammer Shock'' will cast from wherever '''Poppy''' is at the end of the cast time.

effects.str:
• Initial Physical Damage: (+ 90% bonus AD) (+ 8% of target's maximum health)
  • Total Physical Damage: (+ 180% bonus AD) (+ 16% of target's maximum health)

  • Maximum Initial Monster Damage: (+ 90% bonus AD)
  • Maximum Monster Damage: (+ 180% bonus AD)

st_slices: (+ 90% '''bonus''' AD) (+ 8% of target's '''maximum''' health)
(+ 180% '''bonus''' AD) (+ 16% of target's '''maximum''' health)

r1.name: Keeper's Verdict
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Poppy''' {{tip|channels|charges}} while being {{tip|slow|slowed}} by 15% for up to 4 seconds to increase ''Keeper's Verdict's'' {{sti|range}} and {{tip|airborne|knock back}} distance over {{fd|0.5}} seconds after the first {{fd|0.5}} seconds of the channel. ''Keeper's Verdict'' can be recast at any time within its duration.

{{sbc|Recast:}} '''Poppy''' releases the charge with a {{fd|0.25}} seconds cast time, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to all enemies in a radius around and an area in front of her and {{tip|airborne|knocking them up}} for {{fd|0.75}} seconds.

If '''Poppy''' charged for at least {{fd|0.5}} seconds, she smashes the ground, causing ''Keeper's Verdict'' to deal increased damage and {{tip|airborne|knock back}} its targets {{tt|a massive distance towards the enemy team's [[Spawn|fountain]]|Also scales up over the first 1 second of the channel}}. If no enemies are within the uncharged hitbox, the slam creates a shockwave instead that travels in the target direction until it collides with an enemy {{tip|champion}}, causing a hammer to erupt. Enemies hit by the shockwave or the hammer's eruption receive the empowered effects.

If '''Poppy''' is {{tip|interrupt|interrupted}} during the charge, or the charge completes without reactivation, ''Keeper's Verdict'' is canceled and the ability is put on a 30-second {{sti|cooldown}}.
Enemies knocked {{tip|airborne}} are {{tip|sight|revealed}} and are rendered {{tip|untargetable}} while being displaced if '''Poppy''' charged ''Keeper's Verdict'' for more than {{fd|0.5}} seconds.
r1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Poppy charges while being slowed by 15% for up to 4 seconds to increase Keeper's Verdict's range and knock back distance over 0.5 seconds after the first 0.5 seconds of the channel. Keeper's Verdict can be recast at any time within its duration.
Recast: Poppy releases the charge with a 0.25 seconds cast time, dealing physical damage to all enemies in a radius around and an area in front of her and knocking them up for 0.75 seconds.
If Poppy charged for at least 0.5 seconds, she smashes the ground, causing Keeper's Verdict to deal increased damage and knock back its targets a massive distance towards the enemy team's Spawn. If no enemies are within the uncharged hitbox, the slam creates a shockwave instead that travels in the target direction until it collides with an enemy champion, causing a hammer to erupt. Enemies hit by the shockwave or the hammer's eruption receive the empowered effects.
If Poppy is interrupted during the charge, or the charge completes without reactivation, Keeper's Verdict is canceled and the ability is put on a 30-second cooldown.
Enemies knocked airborne are revealed and are rendered untargetable while being displaced if Poppy charged Keeper's Verdict for more than 0.5 seconds.
r1.notes:
* During the Recast's cast time, '''Poppy's''' {{si|Flash}} is {{tip|lockout|sealed}}.
* The erupting hammer of the charged cast that sends out a missile will be centered on the first champion struck, not at the location the missile collided with them.
* Enemies within the enemy team's fountain (at least 400 units away from the {{tt|center of the fountain|the respawning point}}) that are hit by a ''Keeper's Verdict'' that would knock them back are instead {{tip|airborne|knocked up}} for {{fd|0.75}} seconds and not rendered {{tip|untargetable}}, like the uncharged effect. They still receive the full damage.
* ''Keeper's Verdict'' does not destroy in-flight {{tip|projectile|projectiles}} for enemies hit if they are rendered {{tip|untargetable}}.
* The {{tip|airborne|knock back}} will only displace enemies as far as they can go (e.g. to the furthest current spot available of {{ais|Realm of Death|Mordekaiser}} and {{ais|The Hextech Ultimatum|Camille}} borders and to the corner of the fountain).
** The displacement's duration will remain unchanged regardless of if the knock back cannot achieve its full distance due to the affected target being restricted by boundaries they are unable to cross. In order for this to be possible, the speed of the knock back is decreased (based on where the actual landing point is) to match the amount of distance covered to time spent displaced.
* ''Keeper's Verdict's'' {{tip|airborne}} debuff cannot be removed by {{tip|cleanse|cleansing}} effects.
** {{pending for test}} Ending the forced movement prematurely in any way also removes the airborne debuff.
* The following table refers for interactions while '''Poppy''' is {{tip|channel|channeling}}:
{{ct|charge|attack=false|move=true|cast=false|items=interrupts, true,, false|spells=true, true, interrupts, interrupts, recasts}}
r1.cooldown_warn: Wiki's and Riot's cooldowns do not match: Wiki's value '{{tt|{{ap|140|120|100}}|Starts post-effect}}' as '0/140/120/100/0' and riot's value '140,120,100' as '140/120/100'

effects.str: • Uncharged Physical Damage: (+ 45% bonus AD)
